title: New cluster technologies
description:
Search, analyse and tryout new technologies that could be used in our new docker based cluster engine. Possible technologies are:
  • RabbitMQ
  • MemCache
  • Redis
  • ngnix
  • ...

The target is to build a simple little application that shares state (session and global cache) over all the cluster nodes. I will try to implement the same application mutliple times with the different technologies mentioned above.
